location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra], to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a cover for another for George Skipp in Shiraz (not present) and contains the news that the Turks have seized eleven of Meer Mahanna's [Mīr Muhanna] boats at Basra and the Bombay, Tyger,and Wolfships had failed in an attempt to seize more of the Mīr's gallivats (a type of large boat). The likelihood of a revenge attack by the Mīr is discussed.
